beer.beer_description: Brewed since 1994, our Black Chocolate Stout has itself become a modern classic, heralded the world over. It achieves its dark chocolate aroma and flavour through the artful blending of six malts and three distinct mashes.

items.badge_name: Cheers to Independent U.S. Craft Breweries (Level 63)
items.badge_description: Cheers, beer patriot! You are supporting the small and independent American craft brewer. When you see the seal -- shaped like an upside-down beer bottle -- that's independence you're tasting. Try 5 more to earn Level 64!

You don't always intend to go for beers with a double digit ABV, but when you do, you make it count! Cheers to you, but be careful, 10% and up can really pack a punch. That's 40 different beers with an ABV of 10% and up. Try 5 more for Level 9!

There's beer in them thar hills! You're setting off on your journey through the world of beer, but be sure to take a little time to get to know each brewery as you go. That's a beer from 135 different breweries. Try 5 more for Level 28!

beer.beer_description: Brewed since 1994, our Black Chocolate Stout has itself become a modern classic, heralded the world over. It achieves its dark chocolate aroma and flavour through the artful blending of six malts and three distinct mashes.

Porters and Stouts are rich with both history and flavor. Roasty, dark, and delicious, these two styles helped start it all. That’s 230 different beers with the style of Porter or Stout. Try 5 more for Level 47!

items.badge_name: Beyond a Shadow of a Stout (Level 4)
items.badge_description: We all love Stouts, and now we have a dedicated badge to celebrate your dedication to these dark, top-fermented beer in multiple variations, like Oatmeal, Milk and more! Which one will you start with? That's 20 different beers with the style of Stout. Try 5 more for Level 5!

items.badge_description: Happy Untappd anniversary to you! Thanks for sticking around and drinking socially with us. Cheers! That's 8 years on Untappd!

It's time to give bottle shops some love by adding them as your purchased location. That's 115 check-ins with a purchased location! Tag 5 more to get to Level 24. Want to learn more about this badge? Check out our podcast

Round and round the wheel goes! Which style you’ll be drinking, nobody knows! Your desire to explore different styles is inspiring. Keep it up! That's a check-in to at least 50 different styles. Try 5 more for Level 11!

items.checkin_comment: So chocolatey! Great with a whoopie pie!
